Case# NSWindow.TitleVisibility.hidden

macOS 10.10+

```
case hidden
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/TitleVisibility-swift.enum/hidden#Discussion)

The window hides the title and moves the toolbar up into the area previously occupied by the title.

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/TitleVisibility-swift.enum/hidden#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/TitleVisibility-swift.enum/hidden#Constants)

[`case visible`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/titlevisibility-swift.enum/visible)The window has the regular window title and title bar buttons.
